____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns a 2D distance ([[distance]] projected to X,Y plane) in meters between two [[Object]]s or two [[Position]]s or [[Object]] and [[Position]].
<br><br>
[[Image:distance2D.jpg|400px]]
</value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> param1 '''distance2D''' param2 </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> param1: [[Object]], [[Position2D]] or [[Position3D]]</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> param2: [[Object]], [[Position2D]] or [[Position3D]]</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] -  Distance in meters or 1e10 if distance cannot be calculated </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_meters = [[player]] [[distance2D]] heli;</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[distance]], [[distanceSqr]], [[vectorDistance]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
